Fuels Commodities
=================

+------+----------------+
| Code | Fuel           |
+======+================+
|  BF  | Bio fuel       |
+------+----------------+
|  BM  | Biomass        |
+------+----------------+
|  CO  | Coal           |
+------+----------------+
|  EL  | Electricity    |
+------+----------------+
|  E1  | Electricity 1  |
+------+----------------+
|  E2  | Electricity 2  |
+------+----------------+
|  GO  | Geothermal     |
+------+----------------+
|  HF  | Heavy Fuel Oil |
+------+----------------+
|  HY  | Hydro          |
+------+----------------+
|  NG  | Natural gas    |
+------+----------------+
|  NU  | Nuclear        |
+------+----------------+
|  OC  | Ocean          |
+------+----------------+
|  OI  | Oil            |
+------+----------------+
|  SO  | Sun            |
+------+----------------+
|  UR  | Uranium        |
+------+----------------+
|  WI  | Wind           |
+------+----------------+
|  WS  | Waste          |
+------+----------------+
